page.title: 12Caravan Sites-Hest Bank
page.content: In Slyne-with Hest there are two caravan sites.Both are on the shore, close to Morecambe Bay. Morecambe Lodge is the bigger caravan site of the two and holds around 200 caravans.It is quite popular because it is on Morecambe Bay.The other caravan site is in Hest Bank, it is called Caravan Camping.Caravan Camping is over the level crossing near a sewege tank. You get to it by a little lane and it holds approximately 25 caravans.There are also some public toilets there. People rent them for their holidays and weekends.
